name: Wobbly City At Sea
description:
You've been named the mayor of a tiny island stuck at sea, but there's one *small* problem...

The island is only held up by a tiny piece of rock!

With people ready to build a city on your island, it's your job to dictate where builds are builds as to best balance the weight and make sure the city doesn't fall into sea. Just be sure not to upset your residents too much or you'll be stuck without any buildings to place!

Drag and drop the queued up building where you think it fits best, and see if you can fill up the open plots without a watery end!
